channel.title: SOC on Complexity Methods for Behavioural Science
channel.description: Recent content in SOC on Complexity Methods for Behavioural Science

item.title: Day 1 schedule
item.description: Today’s Topics: Welcome! How to get started with Complexity Methods for the Behavioural Sciences Introduction to Complexity Science Introduction to the mathematics of change: Growth models Coupled dynamics Demystifying deterministic chaos Tentative time table for Day 1 When What Who Topics Notes 09.30-11.00 Opening Event Prof. Dr. Paul Hendriks, Dean of the Nijmegen School of Management; Group Picture Location: Aula, Comeniuslaan 2 11.
